\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* shew \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* thee.
